trans-unit.source: Automatically adds an ASP.NET AJAX endpoint to a service, without requiring configuration, in a managed hosting environment that dynamically activates host instances for the service in response to incoming messages.
trans-unit.target: 在可动态激活服务的主机实例以响应传入消息的托管宿主环境下，能够向该服务中自动添加 ASP.NET AJAX 终结点而无需进行配置。

trans-unit.source: This factory provides a way to add an ASP.NET AJAX endpoint to a service without requiring configuration.
trans-unit.target: 此工厂提供一种无需配置便可将 ASP.NET AJAX 终结点添加到服务的方法。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint is added to any other endpoints that are defined in configuration, if any.
trans-unit.target: 可将终结点添加到在配置中定义的任何其他终结点（如果存在）。

trans-unit.source: The managed hosting environments that support this type of dynamic host activation are Internet Information Services (IIS) and Windows Process Activation Services (WAS).
trans-unit.target: 支持这种动态主机激活的托管宿主环境为 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 和 Windows 进程激活服务 (WAS)。

trans-unit.source: To use this factory, specify the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.WebScriptServiceHostFactory> in the `Factory` attribute of the [@ServiceHost](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf-directive/servicehost.md) directive.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此工厂，指定<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.WebScriptServiceHostFactory>中`Factory`属性[ @ServiceHost ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf-directive/servicehost.md)指令。

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET AJAX endpoint created by this factory is configured with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior>, with all the default settings.
trans-unit.target: 可使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior> 及所有默认设置配置由此工厂创建的 ASP.NET AJAX 终结点。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint is created at an empty address relative to the .svc file.
trans-unit.target: 可在相对于 .svc 文件的空地址处创建该终结点。

trans-unit.source: If service configuration already defines an endpoint at this address, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown and the service fails to start.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务配置已在此地址处定义了一个终结点，则会引发 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> 并且无法启动该服务。

trans-unit.source: Specify the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.WebScriptServiceHostFactory> for the value of the `Factory` attribute in the [@ServiceHost](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf-directive/servicehost.md) directive to activate an ASP.NET AJAX endpoint for the `MyService` service as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.WebScriptServiceHostFactory>的值的`Factory`属性中[ @ServiceHost ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf-directive/servicehost.md)指令来激活的 ASP.NET AJAX 终结点`MyService`服务下面的示例中所示。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activation.WebScriptServiceHostFactory" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activation.WebScriptServiceHostFactory" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Normally, this constructor is called automatically by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] as part of service activation - there is no need to call this method manually.
trans-unit.target: 通常，[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 会在服务激活过程中自动调用此构造函数，因此无需手动调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The type of service to host.
The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of type <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the base addresses for the service hosted.
trans-unit.target: 类型为 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 且包含所承载服务的基址的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a derived class of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost" /> for a specified type of service with a specific base address that can be used to automatically enable ASP.NET AJAX endpoints in certain scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 为具有特定基址的指定类型的服务创建 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost" /> 的派生类，在某些情况下可使用该服务来自动启用 ASP.NET AJAX 终结点。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost" /> for the type of service specified with the specified base address.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定基址指定的该类型服务的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost" />。

trans-unit.source: Normally, this method is called automatically by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] as part of service activation - there is no need to call this method manually.
trans-unit.target: 通常，[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 会在服务激活过程中自动调用此方法，因此无需手动调用它。

trans-unit.source: Another service uses the same base address, or another endpoint is using the same address as the ASP.NET AJAX endpoint that this factory is trying to create.
trans-unit.target: 另一个服务使用相同的基址，或另一个终结点正在使用与此工厂试图创建的 ASP.NET AJAX 终结点相同的地址。
